name: Aurora Runealis
description:
Note: Audio is crunchy in Chrome but works fine in Firefox, I'm so sorry.

Paint the Aurora Runealis by arranging the runes to match the ones in the sky.

Controls:
Move: WASD/Arrows
Pick up/put down/accept: Space/Enter
Cancel: ESC

Choose Match mode for a normal game, or choose a Mirror mode for extra challenge!

BGM is Ambiment by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3359-ambiment
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
